description:
Summer is here, and we're checking out one of the newest craft beer venues in Bristol - hopefully sat outside.

This is just a social night so no talks, but we'll stick a bit of money behind the bar. Come along and talk about mobile tech with good beer!!

location.address: 31/32 King Street, The Beermuda Triangle, BS1 4DZ
location.name: Small Bar

title: Summer social
